divs: Sighting Detailsnoticed white light with a beam of light coming from the bottom of object.later it had moved across the sky and appeared closer.i always look up at the sky every night.a very bright light more so than a normal star.a ufo.my feeling on this is that the object was not nice.it became light outside
Summary: green white red lights over grand junction co
